property.name: message
property.value: Hello, Dora! You're probably wondering what you're doing here. Well, I can't help you there, but I suggest you try and get to those stairs over there.\n\nTry WALKING a bit with the arrow keys, WASD or HJKL.

property.name: message
property.value: Good! Now, for reasons I won't go into, you have been blessed with the ability to pick up heavy wooden doors with neither a huff nor a puff!\n\nFirst WALK next to the door down there.

property.name: message
property.value: Crikey. As you can imagine, a team of scientists is investigating this phenomenon as we speak, but while they deliberate, you'd best press on.\n\nPress Space, Enter, X or E and then left to close the door, then pick it up and continue to the stairs.

property.name: message
property.value: While in here I suggest not looking to either side too much. We've no idea what kind of transdimensional monsters could be lurking in the void... Continue through to pick up the door again.

property.name: message
property.value: Lovely. Now just pop over to the stairs, and I'll talk to you in the next room.

property.name: message
property.value: Now you're next to the door, you can LIFT it.\n\nFirst, press Space, Enter, E or X, followed by the direction to the door.
